EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send out the email to a user selected during the 'Initiate Feedback' process
EmailTemplate.name: DRDP_Feedback Form
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Feedback_Providers__c.Feedback_Id__c} Provide Feedback about - {!Feedback_Providers__c.Supplier_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Feedback_Providers__c.Feedback_Provider_First_Name__c},
In order to help me prepare for my upcoming meeting with {!Feedback_Providers__c.Supplier_Name__c}, I would like to collect some feedback about our recent activities with the Organization.
Please navigate to the link below in order to provide some feedback about the Organization.
Click here
Thank You. {!User.Name}
